Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Dish
Description: Dish with a flat bottom, flared S-shaped body, rounded protruding lip. The clay is fine, well fired, orange and has been polished. Throwing marks are still visible, however, and the vessel is also misshapen. The lip has been painted with a white stripe, which has leaked on to the exterior surface. A few spots decorate the inside.
